trans-unit.source: Sets the specified window's show state

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies how the window is to be shown:

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
Specifies how the window is to be shown:

target.mrk: [optional]
Specifies how the window is to be shown:

trans-unit.source: @SW_HIDE - Hides the window and activates another window

seg-source.mrk: @SW_HIDE - Hides the window and activates another window

target.mrk: @SW_HIDE - Hides the window and activates another window

trans-unit.source: @SW_MAXIMIZE - Maximizes the specified window

seg-source.mrk: @SW_MAXIMIZE - Maximizes the specified window

target.mrk: @SW_MAXIMIZE - Maximizes the specified window

trans-unit.source: @SW_MINIMIZE - Minimizes the specified window and activates the next top-level window in the Z order

seg-source.mrk: @SW_MINIMIZE - Minimizes the specified window and activates the next top-level window in the Z order

target.mrk: @SW_MINIMIZE - Minimizes the specified window and activates the next top-level window in the Z order

trans-unit.source: @SW_RESTORE - Activates and displays the window

seg-source.mrk: @SW_RESTORE - Activates and displays the window

target.mrk: @SW_RESTORE - Activates and displays the window

trans-unit.source: @SW_SHOW - Activates the window and displays it in its current size and position

seg-source.mrk: @SW_SHOW - Activates the window and displays it in its current size and position

target.mrk: @SW_SHOW - Activates the window and displays it in its current size and position

trans-unit.source: @SW_SHOWDEFAULT - Sets the show state based on the SW_ flag specified in the STARTUPINFO structure

seg-source.mrk: @SW_SHOWDEFAULT - Sets the show state based on the SW_ flag specified in the STARTUPINFO structure

target.mrk: @SW_SHOWDEFAULT - Sets the show state based on the SW_ flag specified in the STARTUPINFO structure

trans-unit.source: @SW_SHOWMAXIMIZED - Activates the window and displays it as a maximized window

seg-source.mrk: @SW_SHOWMAXIMIZED - Activates the window and displays it as a maximized window

target.mrk: @SW_SHOWMAXIMIZED - Activates the window and displays it as a maximized window

trans-unit.source: @SW_SHOWMINIMIZED - Activates the window and displays it as a minimized window

seg-source.mrk: @SW_SHOWMINIMIZED - Activates the window and displays it as a minimized window

target.mrk: @SW_SHOWMINIMIZED - Activates the window and displays it as a minimized window

trans-unit.source: @SW_SHOWMINNOACTIVE - Displays the window as a minimized window

seg-source.mrk: @SW_SHOWMINNOACTIVE - Displays the window as a minimized window

target.mrk: @SW_SHOWMINNOACTIVE - Displays the window as a minimized window

trans-unit.source: @SW_SHOWNA - Displays the window in its current state

seg-source.mrk: @SW_SHOWNA - Displays the window in its current state

target.mrk: @SW_SHOWNA - Displays the window in its current state

trans-unit.source: @SW_SHOWNOACTIVATE - Displays a window in its most recent size and position

seg-source.mrk: @SW_SHOWNOACTIVATE - Displays a window in its most recent size and position

target.mrk: @SW_SHOWNOACTIVATE - Displays a window in its most recent size and position

trans-unit.source: @SW_SHOWNORMAL - Activates and displays a window

seg-source.mrk: @SW_SHOWNORMAL - Activates and displays a window

target.mrk: @SW_SHOWNORMAL - Activates and displays a window
